pages.text: Increases the range of cast spells by 6%. Affects:$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_resonance)Path of Resonance$(/l)$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_the_sojourn)Path of the Sojourn $()

pages.mod_text: Your scepter can project its energy further. Imbues onto the Scepter of Insight, the Builders Scepter, and the Scepter of Recall.
